Articles.Content:
Hello all,

Iv been playing KSP since before the Mun was invented, so iv decided to join the forums and contribute rather than just read them!

The thing is mostly play around with are space planes, the end result of which ended up flying around on Laythe (now out of fuel and requires rescue :/ )

Iv also recently been playing around with Rovers, and managed to land a piloted Mun Buggy, I plan to use the same design soon for missions to Duna. (I've neglected Duna recently when I found out to some poor Kerbals horror and quick death that a space plane with air breathing engines wont work there!)

Anyway I have a few SSTO's to show to the world on the K prize part of the forum very soon, one of which is a bit odd

Cheerio!
